-- SCR# 728 --> 04.02.2002 SH (Call to GM100 implemented)
-- FCI handling
-- Vars for initializing CREDIT LIMIT CLIENT REQUEST
-- Translate LOGICAL_NAME for UPD TextViewer, the LogicalName
-- does not extract by calling extarnal programs per function UDP
-- Handle multiple IMQD rows, until the user stops further handling
-- Handle only one IMQD row
HYPA_ID > 0
-- Dispaly archived documents
-- No archive
... open TextVewer
... dispaly Tamino document
-- A new debtor client was entered with ICA701D, an additional screen for PL
-- Search/add a new debtor if not already added via ODC200B
-- A debtor client was selected or added
-- Ask to continue with next IMQD row
-- Delete previous Text-File
-- Create Text-File
-- Send Folder/Filename of the created Text-File to the TextViewer
-- which will display the content of the file
.. in case of FCI, get debtor address fields to initialize the DEBH address
fields, if button New debtor is pressed in ODHC01
-- Give message that no debtor is selecetd or added
... fetch some variables from selected/new debtor client
... it's not allowed to have credit limits on affiliates (branch), it has to be
done no main office
... switch to main office (legal owner)
... store selected/new debtor in current IMQD row and update ARCH
... and call the Credit Limit Reqest screen to handle the limit request
... check if a limit request was added/stored
-- If the credit limit request exists, ask the user if the request was handled
correctly
... if the user answer = Yes, delete the current IMQD/MQDT messages
... set limit type
... set limit type
... get buyer number, is used to pass to ODHC01, to initialize DEBC_DEBC if a
debtor client is created
